description: Try our easy to follow Baked Avocado Fries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Baked Avocado Fries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place flour and egg into 2 separate bowls. Combine seeds, parmesan and spice mix into a 3rd bowl and rub together with fingertips to combine.
Halve avocado and remove stone. Peel and cut each half into 6 wedges.
Dust lightly with flour, shaking off excess. Dip into egg then coat with seed mixture. Lay onto baking tray and spray with oil.
Bake for 10 minutes. Turn wedges over and bake for 5 minutes until golden.
